text: Is there a preferred way of documenting function-like objects (“functors”) ? I do realise this could be included in the type documentation but wonder if I am not just missing some neat tweak. Thank you!

elements.text: Is there a preferred way of documenting function-like objects (“functors”) ? I do realise this could be included in the type documentation but wonder if I am not just missing some neat tweak. Thank you!

text:
You can do this:
```julia> struct A end

julia> "functor docs"
       (::A)(args...)
A

help?> A

  functor docs```
